title: UFYB 230: Therapy v. Coaching - How to Know What Help Works When: A Conversation with Mollie Birney
itunes:title: Therapy v. Coaching - How to Know What Help Works When: A Conversation with Mollie Birney
description:
What is the difference between therapy and life coaching? Are the two modalities at odds with each other? When might you want to seek a therapist vs a coach to support you?

 

In this week’s podcast episode, therapist and life coach Mollie Birney joins me for an exploration of these questions and more. Tune in to learn more about both therapy AND coaching, and how both modalities can support your own mental health journey.

 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/230
